name: Cosmo Christmas
description:
Events unfold on the planet Mina, where the main character - the robot Umi, is in search of a magical Christmas mood. Various obstacles appear in his way, such as the terrible Mr. Mushrooms and the Flying Eyes, but Umi was ready to resist all adversity.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Pause: ESC

Using potions/crafting: mouse
